item.title: Erin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Erin add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Erin add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Erin add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Erin add a quote by A.A. Milne
Erin add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Erin add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Erin add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "We are not necessarily doubting that God will do the best for us; we are wondering how painful the best will turn out to be." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Erin add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "God can't give us peace and happiness apart from Himself because there is no such thing." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Erin add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Nothing is yet in its true form." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Erin add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Do not let us mistake necessary evils for good." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Instructions for living a life. Pay attention. Be astonished. Tell about it." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift." -- Mary Oliver
